panels.title: Namespace(s) usage on total cluster CPU in %
Namespace(s) usage on total cluster RAM in %

targets.expr:
(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~".+", workload_type="$type"}) by (workload))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~".+", workload_type="$type"}) by (workload))

list.description: Can be used to filter on a specific deployment, statefulset or deamonset (only relevant panels).
list.name: created_by
